title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, a dialog is displayed that does not have a default folder selected. Instead, it shows options such as the desktop and my computer. Ideally, the default folder should be set to the default content location if no specific location is provided.
OB: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, the dialog should have a default folder selected, preferably the default content location.
EB: No specific expected behavior has been mentioned.
SR: Set the default folder for the Import Project dialog to the default content location when importing an existing Eclipse project on XP.
